metadata.title: CVE-2023-30456 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in arch/x86/kvm/vmx/nested.c in the Linux kernelbefore 6.2.8. nVMX on x86_64 lacks consistency checks for CR0 and CR4.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
